article_title: TMZ Live: CMA Awards -- Going after President Obama ... Again

TMZ Sports

Big Shaq got TURNT ALL THE WAY UP at a rap show in Oklahoma City -- getting onstage and headbanging along ... while a jacked muscle dude joined the gang and started flexing on the NBA…
